name: Krzysztof Nowak
story: Krzysztof Nowak grew up in a small town in eastern Poland. After finishing high school he moved to Warsaw where he worked odd jobs to make ends meet. When the civil war in his home country broke out, Krzysztof joined the Independent faction as a way to make some money. He quickly rose through the ranks, gaining a reputation as a ruthless and cunning looter. Despite his success, Krzysztof is never satisfied and always seeks new ways to increase his wealth and power.
